GSD.description:
tracing: Fix sleeping function called from invalid context on RT kernel

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 40f9fde06b25884baa0c4bd138b909a9b67218b4. For more details please see the references link.
